name: ec2-rotate-ip
description: Script to automatically rotate an Elastic IP from within an EC2 instance

scripts.build: cd src && tsc && cd ../build && echo "#!/usr/bin/node" > ec2-rotate-ip.js && cat index.js >> ec2-rotate-ip.js && chmod +x ec2-rotate-ip.js
scripts.run: npm run build && cd build && node .
